name: Dodge Saw!
description:
i have made many games but this is one of my first games that i would like to share with you guys!

the score on the top right is the count of how long you survived, surviving! and the score on the top left is the count of the world highscore (highest time survived)

try beating the highscore!!

if you liked it, (if you can) please donate toward this game! hope you ENJOYED!!
